physician.description: Physician responsible for the interpretation of the imaging results

institution.description: Institution in which the exam is performed

exam_date_time.description: Date and time of exam, format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss

tracer.description: Radio tracer, Technetium-99m Diethylenetriaminepentaacetic acid, Technetium-99m Mercaptuacetyltriglycine.

patient_position.description: Position of the patient during image captation

acquisition_time.description: Duration of acquisition, ISO 8601 ABNF: P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S

calculation_method.description: Calculation method used for renal function estimation

urinary_tract_duplication.description: Duplication of urinary tract resulting in an 'additionnal' urinary tract to describe

renal_transplant.description: Presence of a renal transplant resulting in an 'additionnal' urinary tract to describe

bladder_diversion.description: Bladder diversion in place at the time of the exam

bladder_onset.description: Bladder onset time, described according to ISO 8601 ABNF: P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S

renal_function_symmetry.description: Renal function symmetry, according to the physician's evaluation

urinary_tract_results.description: Successive description of urinary tracts results, taking account of the (rare) possibility of anatomical variations

urinary_tract_id.description: Generated hash id for each successively described urinary tract

lateralisation.description: Lateralisation of the urinary tract to be described

diversion.description: Presence of a urinary diversion in the described urinary tract

cortical_transit_time.description: Cortical transit time, described using ISO 8601 ABNF: P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S

cortical_transit_time_evaluation.description: Cortical transit time, as evaluated by the physician

pyelocaliceal_time.description: Time to pyelocaliceal passage, described using ISO 8601 ABNF: P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S

late_images.description: Tracer progression on late images acquisition

parenchymal_impregnation.description: Parenchymal impregnation of the tracer, as evaluated by the physician

kidney_size.description: Kidney size, as evaluated by the physician

kidney_morphology.description: Kidney morphology, as evaluated by the physician

ureteral_dilatation.description: Ureteral dilatation, as evaluated by the physician

vascular_slope.description: Vascular slope, as evaluated by the physician

tmax.description: Tmax, described using ISO 8601 ABNF: P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S. Any Tmax > 20 min is considered as no Tmax

curve.description: Renogram curve, as evaluated by the physician

renal_function.description: Renal function, as evaluated by the prevously defined method, in percentage

furosemid_test.description: Furosemid test, as evaluated by the physician

comment.description: Free text for manually added comment on urinary tract result

enum: Abnormal not explanatory for clinical description

comment.description: Free text for manually added results, or comment

conclusion.description: Text conclusion, automatically generated, and validated by the imaging physician

conclusion_validation.description: The physician must validate the automatically generated conclusion, after manual modification if required
